description.translate: The disciples who walk in the footsteps of him who is eternal will always set themselves up as sentinels of this world.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Jambards du soldat Eternän\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§aLes disciples qui marchent dans les pas de celui qui est éternel,\"}","{\"text\":\"§a s’érigeront toujours en sentinelles de ce monde.\"}","{\"text\":\"§aThe disciples who walk in the footsteps of him who is eternal\"}","{\"text\":\"§awill always set themselves up as sentinels of this world.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7SPD§c-1\"}"]}}
